Celebrate the season with this Vegan Gingerbread Ice Cream ‚Äî a creamy blend of soy milk,
winter spices, molasses, and Amaretto. Inspired by classic holiday cookies, it captures the warmth of
cinnamon, ginger, and cloves in a smooth, dairy-free scoop.

!!! tip ‚ÄúAlcohol-free Variant‚Äù

    Use 8g *additional* VG instead of the Amaretto for a sober version suited for children.

Process on *Light Ice Cream*, with scrape-down, and a mix-in or respin run if needed.<br clear=all />
